meanings.definition: Written by more than one author.
meanings.sent1: The multiauthor book featured a collaboration of writers.
meanings.sent2: The multiauthor project showcased the combined effort of many writers.
meanings.sent3: The multiauthor article was like a potluck of ideas from different minds.
meanings.sent4: The multiauthor publication was a tapestry woven with diverse voices.
meanings.sent5: The multiauthor story painted a colorful picture with various perspectives.

meanings.definition: Involving or produced by multiple authors.
meanings.sent1: The multiauthor research paper was a joint effort by several writers.
meanings.sent2: The multiauthor blog post reflected the collective input of various authors.
meanings.sent3: The multiauthor report was a symphony of different writing styles.
meanings.sent4: The multiauthor screenplay was a mosaic of creative minds coming together.
meanings.sent5: The multiauthor project was a quilt of ideas stitched by multiple authors.
